WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I installed 0.9.1.1 with VS2013, I can't show a *.ts file have include complete *.js file that like VS2012.
But the complete js file can find in that folder.
Thanks!
WorkItem.Summary: can't show js file in VS 2013's solution explorer

Comments.Message:
@sunquest, the .js files are no longer displayed in Visual Studio. See https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions/453620

(Ignore my post, because it seems to be working after all)

Note the JS files are still in the folder, so if you click on the 'show all files' button in solution explorer, you can still see them (and can drag/drop from their onto HTML pages etc...), they are just not part of the project now.  Thanks!
